Sentencas: Surface topography and mechanical characteristics of ceramic substrates is very important for the thermal spraying for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Surface topography and mechanical characteristics of ceramics roughened by erosion

Sentencas: Usually, surfaces are eroded by blasting before thermal spraying to increase the adhesive strength of coatings.
Titulo: Surface topography and mechanical characteristics of ceramics roughened by erosion

Sentencas: The erosion tests were performed for three hinds of commercial ceramics (Al2O3, machinable ceramics: MACOR, glass) with changing impingement velocity and time.
Titulo: Surface topography and mechanical characteristics of ceramics roughened by erosion

Sentencas: The eroded surfaces were evaluated by average surface roughness (R(a)), fractal dimension (F.D.) and wear volume based on Evans' theory.
Titulo: Surface topography and mechanical characteristics of ceramics roughened by erosion

Sentencas: It was concluded that the relations between effective wear rate and eroded surface topography depend on the crack types, and fractal dimension increases with fracture toughness of ceramics.
Titulo: Surface topography and mechanical characteristics of ceramics roughened by erosion
